messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 3/22/01
messages.msgSnippet: March 22 Foster s Daily Democrat : N.H. home-schoolers want access to extracurricular programs http://www.fosters.com/news_2001a/mar_01/22/w-nh0322a.htm
messages.messageBody:
March 22
Foster's Daily Democrat : N.H. home-schoolers want access to extracurricular
programs
http://www.fosters.com/news_2001a/mar_01/22/w-nh0322a.htm
Homeschoolers in NH spoke in favor of legislation to force schools to allow
homeschooled children full access to extracurricular activities.

Star Tribune : Committee removes home-school measures
http://www2.startribune.com/stOnLine/cgi-bin/article?thisStory=83835187
Scroll down to see this. MN homeschoolers successfully killed two bills, one
setting requirements for education level of homeschooling parents, and the
other requiring them to submit their children's test scores.

March 21, 2001
Amarillo Globe-News : Home schooler wins Randall senior bee
http://www.amarillonet.com/stories/032101/new_randallsenior.shtml
